description: This file defines the Response class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, representing a JSON-RPC response message with methods to access message details such as ID, result, error, and validity.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC response message with methods to access response details such as ID, result, error, and validation status.

methods.name: Response()
methods.description: Constructor for initializing a Response object.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID associated with the response.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Checks if the response contains a result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result object if present.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Checks if the response contains an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error object if present.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Determines if the response is valid.
